alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Dade; Hickory; Polk (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 7:46PM CDT until September 23 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Hickory County in central Missouri... Southern Cedar County in southwestern Missouri... Polk County in southwestern Missouri... Northeastern Dade County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 745 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Warsaw to near Humansville to 8 miles southwest of Stockton, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bolivar, Stockton Lake, Pomme de Terre Lake, Stockton State Park, Stockton, Pittsburg, Humansville, Polk, Pleasant Hope, Fair Play, Morrisville, Dadeville, Jerico Springs, Halfway, Flemington, Aldrich, Arcola, Umber View Heights, Bearcreek and Cane Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
